channel.title: What Is A good free webhost that allows php and html?
channel.description:
What is a good webhost that you can build your website on that has .php and html?
Some of the ones i made accounts on are so junked up i dont know how to make my page..[br][size=1]Posted at: June 13, 2006, 03:51:39 pm[/size][hr]..

item.title: What Is A good free webhost that allows php and html?
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:4, topic:3840”]localhost is probably one of the best free web-hosts ever.
you are totally in charge, you control uptime, permissions, programs used on the server.

http://127.0.0.1/

NOTE: may require some installation and configuration by yourself.[/quote]
I (used) to run a site on my comp
wamp server

Read full topic
item.source: What Is A good free webhost that allows php and html?

item.title: What Is A good free webhost that allows php and html?

item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“Swift, post:3, topic:3840”]Yeah, HTML is too easy. I learned it at 11 years of age
Here’s my site I made today. The graphics and all. I’ll be coding it tomorrow.

http://www.fixgraphics.com[/quote]
pfft i learnd @ like 7 or 8

If are looking for one of those retarded website builders like freewebs, then you probably wont find a decent one on another host. Now is a good oppurtunity to learn a thing or two about html(Seriously, I learned the basics of it when I was 10, so can you.)
